entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -33.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 1:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -33.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -38.4°C
Wind: NW 26 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
